title: Bajiu Buli 2
synopsis: In a remote mysterious town, there are three friends. They thought they could start the naive mode at this small age. They thought their painting style was a fairy tale. But because the world was too cruel, they were forced to experience a lot of unimaginable The (beep)-like thing. Because the plot is too weird, the posture is not ethical, and it claims to be a "hilarious Tucao drama", even its mother drama "Love Apartment" is already considering whether to distinguish it from it. (translated from iqiyi)
